title: The Pocket Outdoor Survival Guide - J. Wayne Fears
description:
The Pocket Outdoor Survival Guide provides the essential knowledge that hikers, campers, canoeists, hunters, anglers, and anyone who spends time in the outdoors needs to deal with short-term survival situations. This handy guidebook will give you the knowledge to make it through any outdoor adventure, planned or unplanned.

About the Author:
 J. Wayne Fears has experienced survival, both as a survivor and as a search and rescue official. He was extensively trained in survival skills by the U. S. Army and Air Force. As a wildlife professional, part of his job involved search & rescue, especially for missing hunters. He has taught survival classes for various organizations and has written 14 books on outdoor subjects and over 3,000 articles for major outdoor magazines. He has been elected a member of the Explorer's club for his work in the Arctic and serves as editor of "Rural Sportsman" in Progressive Farmer
